description: This file defines an interface IIPNetwork within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It declares methods for managing network addresses and DNS servers, including addition and removal of IP addresses and DNS configurations, along with nested interface IDNSServers for DNS server iteration.

classes.name: IIPNetwork
classes.description: An interface providing methods to modify network address configurations and DNS server settings.

classes.name: IDNSServers
classes.description: Nested interface within IIPNetwork to iterate through DNS server entries.

methods.name: AddAddress
methods.description: Adds an IP address to specified network interface, with overload supporting detailed parameters.

methods.name: RemoveAddress
methods.description: Removes specified IP address configuration from a network interface.

methods.name: AddDNS
methods.description: Adds DNS server configurations via IDNSServers interface.

methods.name: RemoveDNS
methods.description: Removes DNS server configurations via IDNSServers interface.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets DNS server list in IDNSServers interface.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Iterates to the next DNS server in the list.

methods.name: Server
methods.description: Returns the current DNS server address.

ctags.name: IDNSServers
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IDNSServers : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IIPNetwork
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IIPNetwork : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
